name: MoonTales
description:
MoonTales is a short adventure game. In this game, you get to play as Fhinn, a fish on a journey to the moon to be reunited with his loved one.

The current version is a demo version in which you will get introduced to the main character and the gameplay. It can be played in 10 minutes. 

Controls

This game supports Playstation controls. Keyboard and Xbox controls will work as well, but the UI will not adapt to other input.

  • Left Joy: Move
  • X: Interact
  • Left Shoulder: Run
  • Option: Pause
  • O: Back
Save Function

There is no save function available!

Credits
  • Character Art - DuhCookie
  • Environment Art - Kim Hoogeboom
  • Creative Direction - emfiniteart
  • Music - Lelahandco
  • Sound Design - Sten Kloot

Hi! We are Team Fish!

Before this project, we had never worked together before. We didn’t even know one another! We found each other through our shared interest in visual storytelling, fangirling over each other’s talent, and wanting to create a Wholesome Game. 

 Though we have grown very fond of Fhinn, his story ends today. We will continue as a team  (with two new members!) but have chosen to start a new project, focusing on mythology and fairy tales. 

Take a moment to cosy up by playing MoonTales. Let the beautiful environment completely immerse you and let yourself get carried away by the music... Enjoy!
